My team is currently using it as our code last year got deprecated. We are confused on how to set up Pathweaver or any form of trajectories for auton using this swerve drive since it doesn’t have any of the controllers set up. I’ve also never used Pathweaver before so I’m not fully sure how that works. I have some stuff set up in our code here: \u003ca href=\"https://github.com/FRC-8709/2024MainTestChassis\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003ehttps://github.com/\u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eFRC\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"FIRST Robotics Competition\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e-8709/2024MainTestChassis\u003c/a\u003e .
